org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.ui

Class CalendarUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zkoss.zk.ui.AbstractComponent
      • org.zkoss.zk.ui.HtmlBasedComponent
        • org.zkoss.zul.impl.XulElement
          • org.zkoss.zul.Div
            • org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.ui.CalendarUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.zkoss.zk.ui.Component, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.Scope, org.zkoss.zk.ui.sys.ComponentCtrl

    public class CalendarUI
extends org.zkoss.zul.Div
    Custom ZK Div Component to initialize the angular calendar from server side. Few parameters are handled here just for test (view type of the calendar), full parameters will be supported soon when this project will be published for the ZK Community in GitHub
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Odaper: Khaled Mathlouthi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
